div.p: Codes indicating status of current or former military service.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/CodeSystem/military-service
CodeDisplay
not-indicatedNot IndicatedThe military status is not indicated
no-military-serviceNo Military ServiceThe subject has no history of military service
veteranVeteranThe subject is has served in the military but is no longer active
active-dutyActive DutyThe subject is not a reserve member and is currently engaged in full-time military activity
active-reserveActive ReserveThe subject is a reserve member and is currently engaged in full-time military activity
inactive-reserveInactive ReserveThe subject is a reserve member and is not currently engaged in full-time military activity

publisher.value: Health Level Seven, Inc. - CQI WG

description.value: Codes indicating status of current or former military service.
